structure.unit: ARTICLE CVIII. CENTURY GARDENS COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT DISTRICT

text.section:
Sec. 2-1622. Petition.
The Petition to establish the Century Gardens Community Development District over the real property described in Exhibit A attached to the ordinance from which this article derives, which was filed by Century Prestige I, II, III, LLC., Florida limited liability companies, on March 28, 2003 and which Petition is on file at the Office of the Clerk of the Board, is hereby granted. A copy of the Petition is attached and incorporated herein as (Exhibit B).
